Oh Hyeon Tae

Group (2023-present):
FANTASY BOYS

Introduction

Oh Hyeon Tae is a member of the boy group FANTASY BOYS under PocketDol Studios.

He is best known for being a contestant on the survival show Fantasy Boys. His finishing rank was #4.

He is under ABYSS Company and PocketDol Studios.
